page.title: 05Langtoft Grange Farm 1
page.content: {Langtoft Grange Farm}is a mixed arable farm.It has three hundred and eighty five acres split up into 75 acres of wheat 18 acres of rape 37 acres of peas 81 acres of winter barley 51 acres of spring barley 30 acres of second year lay grass 37 acres of permememt pasture and 8 acres of turnips. We also keep 150 bulls and 28 bullocks 240 sheep and 25 hens. In{July}it is nearly harvest time and Stan our combine driver goes to get the combine from my uncles who keeps it there in winter because we don't have room in our sheds while Stan is doing that Dad is cleaning the corn shed out with smoke generators that kill little mites that make the corn sweat and go mouldy.After the smoke has cleared it is safe for Dad to go in the shed. Now he can get the corn tester set up.
